sentence.text: The individual is a female born at 32 weeks of gestational age after normal pregnancy from nonconsanguineous healthy parents.
Her psychomotor development was delayed and although she has attended regular elementary school, she has not been able to graduate with a diploma.
Difficulties with social interaction increased after severe bullying by peers.
From 11 to 16 years of age she was treated with CPAP for obstructive sleep apnea.
X-ray and 3D CT imaging of the skull showed increased bone density of the cranial and facial bones and anterior nasal spine agenesis.
She has undergone cranial surgery to correct frontal bossing and rhinoplasty.
At 20 years of age she had a height of 169.5 cm (70%) and an OFC of 69.4 cm (+4.6 SD).
She has a conductive hearing loss, Scheuermann kyphosis, hypermetropia, concentration problems and mild intellectual disability.
